goal.ch: 本課程旨在提升學生於科學英語及科技英語的溝通能力與技巧。課程素材的主題範圍涵蓋物理、化學、地球科學、生物學、資訊科技、工程和數學等領域，由學生依據其興趣或專長自選。課程將透過閱讀、聽力和口說練習活動，來增進學生的詞彙量、閱讀理解、邏輯分析思考、以及口語表達能力。
goal.en: The purpose of this course is to promote and develop students‘ communicative skills in English within the context of science and technology. The course materials cover a range of topics including physics, chemistry, earth science, biology, information technology, engineering, and mathematics, from which students can choose based on their interests or expertise. Through a variety of engaging activities, students will enhance their vocabulary, improve their analytical skills, and gain confidence in discussing and presenting scientific concepts in English.

outline.ch:
•Vocabulary Development: Students will expand their scientific vocabulary by reading diverse types of scientific texts, including popular science articles, procedural texts, abstracts, and scientific editorials.
•Analytical Skills: Students will improve their analytical skills by reading articles, listening to lectures, watching videos, and discussing scientific research.
•Communication Skills: Students will develop their ability to discuss scientific and technological topics in English, particularly in spoken forms.
•Assignments and Assessments:
1.Listening and Reading Journals: Students will complete listening journals and reading journals regularly to reflect on and analyze the content they have engaged with.
2.Group Discussions: Students will participate in group discussions in English on topics related to science and technology, fostering collaborative learning and enhancing their ability to articulate scientific concepts.
3.Oral Presentations: Students will deliver oral presentations in English on topics related to science and technology, adapting the language, complexity, and level of detail to suit different target audiences.
